name: Dal Bhat
instructions: For Dal (Lentil Soup):,1. Wash yellow lentils thoroughly,2. In a pot, cook lentils with water, turmeric, and salt until soft,3. Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds, garlic, and onion,4. Add tomatoes and cook until soft,5. Add the tempering to the cooked lentils,For Bhat (Rice):,1. Wash rice until water runs clear,2. Add rice and water in 1:2 ratio,3. Cook until rice is tender and fluffy
ingredients: 1 cup Yellow Lentils,2 cups Rice,2 cloves Garlic,1 medium Onion,1 medium Tomato,1 tsp Cumin seeds,1/2 tsp Turmeric powder,2 tbsp Oil,Salt to taste

name: Momo
instructions: For the filling:,1. Mince chicken, onions, and garlic finely,2. Mix with spices and seasonings,For the wrapper:,1. Make a firm dough with flour and water,2. Roll into small circles,Assembly:,1. Place filling in the center of each wrapper,2. Fold and pleat to form dumplings,3. Steam for 15-20 minutes,For the sauce:,1. Blend tomatoes, chilies, and garlic,2. Season with salt and spices
ingredients: 500g Ground chicken,2 cups All-purpose flour,2 Onions,4 cloves Garlic,1 inch Ginger,1 bunch Cilantro,2 Green chilies,Salt to taste,1 tsp Black pepper,Water as needed

name: Sel Roti
instructions: 1. Soak rice for 4-5 hours, then drain,2. Grind rice to make a smooth batter,3. Add sugar, cardamom, and butter,4. Heat oil in a deep pan,5. Pour batter in a circular motion to form rings,6. Fry until golden brown on both sides
ingredients: 2 cups Rice,1/2 cup Sugar,2 tbsp Butter,4 Cardamom pods,Oil for deep frying,Pinch of salt

name: Thukpa
instructions: 1. Prepare the noodles according to package instructions,2. Heat oil in a large pot, add garlic and ginger,3. Add chopped onions and cook until translucent,4. Add vegetables (carrots, cabbage, green onions),5. Add chicken or vegetables and stir-fry,6. Pour in chicken broth and bring to boil,7. Season with salt, pepper, and Nepali spices,8. Add cooked noodles and simmer for 2-3 minutes,9. Garnish with fresh cilantro and green onions
ingredients: 200g Noodles,2 cups Mixed Vegetables,200g Chicken (optional),2 cloves Garlic,1 inch Ginger,1 Onion,4 cups Chicken Broth,2 tbsp Oil,Salt to taste,Black pepper,Fresh cilantro,Green onions

name: Dhido
instructions: 1. Boil water in a thick-bottomed pot,2. Gradually add buckwheat or cornmeal flour while stirring,3. Keep stirring continuously to avoid lumps,4. Cook for about 15-20 minutes, stirring constantly,5. Continue cooking until the mixture becomes very thick,6. Stir vigorously until it pulls away from the sides of the pot,7. Shape into a dome and serve hot with curry or vegetables
ingredients: 2 cups Buckwheat flour or Cornmeal,4 cups Water,1 tsp Salt,Ghee for serving

name: Chatamari
instructions: 1. Make a thin batter with rice flour, water, and salt,2. Heat oil on a flat pan,3. Pour the batter to make a thin crepe,4. Add minced meat or vegetables on top,5. Crack an egg in the center (optional),6. Add spices and seasonings,7. Fold the edges to form a square,8. Cook until crispy on both sides
ingredients: 1 cup Rice flour,Water as needed,200g Minced meat or vegetables,2 Eggs,1 Onion,2 cloves Garlic,1 inch Ginger,Green chilies to taste,Salt and pepper,Oil for cooking

name: Yomari
instructions: 1. Make dough with rice flour and hot water,2. Prepare sweet filling with chaku (molasses) and sesame seeds,3. Shape the dough into cones,4. Fill with the sweet mixture,5. Close the top carefully,6. Shape into traditional fish-tail design,7. Steam for 15-20 minutes,8. Serve warm
ingredients: 2 cups Rice flour,Hot water as needed,200g Chaku (molasses),100g Sesame seeds,Pinch of salt

name: Gundruk
instructions: For Fermentation:,1. Clean and wilt leafy greens,2. Pack tightly in a container,3. Let ferment for 7-10 days,For Cooking:,1. Heat oil in a pan,2. Add cumin seeds and dried red chilies,3. Add fermented gundruk,4. Saut√© until crispy,5. Season with salt and spices
ingredients: 2 cups Fermented leafy greens,2 tbsp Oil,1 tsp Cumin seeds,2-3 Dried red chilies,Salt to taste,1 pinch Turmeric

name: Jhol Momo
instructions: For the Momo:,1. Make regular momo (follow momo recipe above),2. Steam the momos until cooked,For the Jhol (Soup):,1. Heat oil in a pan, add ginger-garlic paste,2. Add tomatoes and cook until soft,3. Add spices: cumin, coriander, turmeric, red chili powder,4. Pour in chicken or vegetable broth,5. Add soy sauce and vinegar for tanginess,6. Simmer for 10 minutes,7. Place steamed momos in bowls,8. Pour hot jhol over momos,9. Garnish with cilantro and green onions
ingredients: 10-12 Steamed Momos,2 Tomatoes,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,2 tbsp Oil,1 tsp Cumin powder,1 tsp Coriander powder,1/2 tsp Turmeric,1 tsp Red chili powder,3 cups Chicken broth,1 tbsp Soy sauce,1 tbsp Vinegar,Fresh cilantro,Green onions

name: Chiura (Beaten Rice)
instructions: 1. Soak beaten rice in water for 2-3 minutes,2. Drain and wash until water runs clear,3. Add salt and mix gently,4. Heat oil in a pan,5. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter,6. Add green chilies and ginger,7. Add turmeric and mix,8. Add the soaked beaten rice,9. Mix gently and cook for 2-3 minutes,10. Garnish with cilantro and serve with yogurt
ingredients: 2 cups Beaten rice (Chiura),1 tsp Salt,2 tbsp Oil,1 tsp Cumin seeds,2 Green chilies,1 inch Ginger,1/2 tsp Turmeric,Fresh cilantro,Yogurt for serving

name: Kwati (Mixed Bean Soup)
instructions: 1. Soak mixed beans overnight,2. Cook beans until tender,3. Heat oil in a large pot,4. Add cumin seeds, asafoetida,5. Add ginger-garlic paste,6. Add tomatoes and cook until soft,7. Add spices: turmeric, coriander, red chili,8. Add cooked beans with their liquid,9. Simmer for 20-30 minutes,10. Add spinach in the last 5 minutes,11. Garnish with cilantro
ingredients: 1 cup Mixed beans (black gram, kidney beans, chickpeas, etc.),2 Tomatoes,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,1 cup Spinach,2 tbsp Oil,1 tsp Cumin seeds,Pinch Asafoetida,1 tsp Turmeric,1 tsp Coriander powder,1 tsp Red chili powder,Salt to taste,Fresh cilantro

name: Aloo Tama (Potato Bamboo Shoot Curry)
instructions: 1. Soak dried bamboo shoots in warm water for 30 minutes,2. Heat oil in a pressure cooker,3. Add cumin seeds and asafoetida,4. Add ginger, garlic, and green chilies,5. Add turmeric and red chili powder,6. Add potatoes and bamboo shoots,7. Add black-eyed peas (soaked overnight),8. Add water and salt,9. Pressure cook for 3-4 whistles,10. Garnish with cilantro
ingredients: 500g Potatoes,200g Dried bamboo shoots,1 cup Black-eyed peas,3 tbsp Oil,1 tsp Cumin seeds,Pinch Asafoetida,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,2 Green chilies,1 tsp Turmeric,1 tsp Red chili powder,Salt to taste,Fresh cilantro

name: Sisnu ko Saag (Nettle Curry)
instructions: 1. Wear gloves and wash nettle leaves carefully,2. Boil water and blanch nettles for 2 minutes,3. Drain and chop the nettles,4. Heat oil in a pan,5. Add cumin seeds and asafoetida,6. Add ginger, garlic, and onions,7. Add tomatoes and cook until soft,8. Add turmeric and red chili powder,9. Add blanched nettles,10. Cook for 10-15 minutes,11. Season with salt
ingredients: 500g Fresh nettle leaves,1 Onion,2 Tomatoes,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,3 tbsp Oil,1 tsp Cumin seeds,Pinch Asafoetida,1/2 tsp Turmeric,1 tsp Red chili powder,Salt to taste

name: Bara (Lentil Pancakes)
instructions: 1. Soak black gram dal for 4-5 hours,2. Grind to a smooth paste with minimal water,3. Add salt, ginger, and green chilies,4. Heat oil in a flat pan,5. Spread batter in circular motion,6. Cook until golden brown on both sides,7. Serve hot with achar (pickle)
ingredients: 2 cups Black gram dal,1 tsp Salt,1 inch Ginger,2 Green chilies,Oil for frying

name: Sukuti (Dried Meat)
instructions: For Drying:,1. Cut meat into thin strips,2. Marinate with salt and spices,3. Dry in the sun for 3-4 days,For Cooking:,1. Soak dried meat in warm water,2. Heat oil in a pan,3. Add cumin seeds and dried chilies,4. Add ginger, garlic, and onions,5. Add soaked sukuti,6. Stir-fry until crispy,7. Add tomatoes and spices,8. Cook until well combined
ingredients: 500g Dried meat (sukuti),2 Onions,2 Tomatoes,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,3 tbsp Oil,1 tsp Cumin seeds,3-4 Dried red chilies,1 tsp Coriander powder,Salt to taste

name: Juju Dhau (King Curd)
instructions: 1. Heat full-fat milk in a heavy-bottomed pan,2. Reduce milk to half by slow cooking,3. Let it cool to lukewarm temperature,4. Add yogurt starter and sugar,5. Mix well and pour into clay pots,6. Cover and keep in a warm place,7. Let it set for 6-8 hours,8. Refrigerate before serving
ingredients: 1 liter Full-fat milk,2 tbsp Yogurt starter,3 tbsp Sugar,Clay pots for setting

name: Choila (Spiced Grilled Meat)
instructions: 1. Marinate meat with salt and turmeric,2. Grill or roast over open fire until cooked,3. Let it cool and cut into small pieces,4. Mix with finely chopped onions,5. Add ginger, garlic, and green chilies,6. Add spices: cumin, coriander, red chili,7. Add mustard oil and lemon juice,8. Mix well and let marinate for 30 minutes,9. Garnish with cilantro and serve
ingredients: 500g Buff or chicken,2 Onions,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,3 Green chilies,1 tsp Cumin powder,1 tsp Coriander powder,1 tsp Red chili powder,2 tbsp Mustard oil,1 tbsp Lemon juice,Fresh cilantro

name: Laphing (Cold Noodles)
instructions: 1. Cut laphing into strips,2. Place in serving bowls,3. Prepare sauce with soy sauce, vinegar, and chili oil,4. Add garlic, ginger paste,5. Mix mustard oil and sesame oil,6. Add chopped spring onions,7. Pour sauce over laphing,8. Toss well and serve cold
ingredients: 200g Laphing (mung bean starch noodles),3 tbsp Soy sauce,2 tbsp Vinegar,1 tbsp Chili oil,1 tsp Garlic paste,1 tsp Ginger paste,1 tbsp Mustard oil,1 tsp Sesame oil,2 Spring onions

name: Baingan Bharta
instructions: 1. Roast the aubergine over an open flame or in an oven until the skin is charred and the flesh is soft.,2. Let it cool, then peel off the skin and mash the flesh.,3. Heat oil in a pan, add chopped onions and saut√© until golden brown.,4. Add minced garlic and green chilli, saut√© for a minute.,5. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften.,6. Stir in red chilli powder, salt, and mix well.,7. Add the mashed aubergine and cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally.,8. Garnish with chopped coriander leaves before serving.
ingredients: 1 large Aubergine,¬Ω cup Onion,1 cup Tomatoes,6 cloves Garlic,1 Green Chilli,¬º teaspoon Red Chilli Powder,1.5 tablespoon Oil,1 tablespoon chopped Coriander Leaves,as required salt

name: Chicken Handi
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a handi or deep pan, add cumin seeds and let them splutter.,2. Add sliced onions and saut√© until golden brown.,3. Add chopped garlic and ginger paste, saut√© for a minute.,4. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften.,5. Add turmeric powder, chilli powder, coriander seeds, and green chillies, mix well.,6. Add chicken pieces and cook until they are browned on all sides.,7. Stir in yogurt and cream, cook on low heat until chicken is tender.,8. Add dried fenugreek leaves and garam masala, mix well.,9. Adjust salt to taste and cook for another 5 minutes.,10. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves before serving.
ingredients: 1.2 kg Chicken,5 thinly sliced Onion,2 finely chopped Tomatoes,8 cloves chopped Garlic,1 tbsp Ginger paste,¬º cup Vegetable oil,2 tsp Cumin seeds,3 tsp Coriander seeds,1 tsp Turmeric powder,1 tsp Chilli powder,2 Green chilli,1 cup Yogurt,¬æ cup Cream,3 tsp Dried fenugreek,1 tsp Garam masala,To taste Salt

name: Dal fry
instructions: 1. Wash the Toor dal thoroughly and soak it in water for 30 minutes.,2. In a pressure cooker, add the soaked dal, water, salt, and turmeric. Cook for 3-4 whistles or until the dal is soft.,3. In a separate pan, heat ghee and add cumin seeds and mustard seeds. Let them splutter.,4. Add bay leaves, green chili, and ginger. Saut√© for a minute.,5. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they are soft.,6. Add the cooked dal to the pan and mix well.,7. Adjust seasoning with salt, red pepper, sugar, and garam masala.,8. Garnish with chopped cilantro before serving.
ingredients: 1 cup Toor dal,2-1/2 cups Water,1 tsp Salt,1/4 tsp Turmeric,3 tbs Ghee,1 cup Chopped tomatoes,1/2 tsp Cumin seeds,1/2 tsp Mustard Seeds,2 Bay Leaf,1 tbs chopped Green Chilli,2 tsp shredded Ginger,2 tbs Cilantro,1/2 tsp Red Pepper,1/2 tsp Salt,1 tsp Sugar,1/4 tsp Garam Masala

name: Rajma Curry
ingredients: 1 tbls Vegetable Oil,1 finely chopped Onion,2 cloves chopped Garlic,1 part Ginger,1 Packet Coriander,1 tsp Cumin,1 tsp Paprika,2 tsp Garam Masala,400g Chopped Tomatoes,400g Kidney Beans,to serve Basmati Rice

name: Lamb Biryani
instructions: 1. Soak the basmati rice in water for 30 minutes, then drain.,2. In a large pot, heat ghee and saut√© onions until golden brown.,3. Add ginger-garlic paste and saut√© for a minute.,4. Add the lamb pieces and brown them on all sides.,5. Stir in yogurt, mint leaves, and cilantro.,6. Add soaked rice, saffron milk, and enough water to cook the rice.,7. Season with salt and biryani masala.,8. Cover and cook on low heat until the rice is done.
ingredients: 12 Cashew nuts,¬Ω tbsp Khus khus,¬Ω tbsp Cumin seeds,3 sliced thinly Onions,2 tsp Ginger garlic paste,4 whole Garlic,Leaves Mint,Leaves Cilantro,¬Ω tsp dissolved in ¬Ω cup warm milk Saffron,2 tbsp Ghee,2 Cups Basmati rice,¬Ω cup Full fat yogurt,1 tbsp Cumin Seeds,¬Ω Bay leaf,1 thin piece Cinnamon,3 Cloves,2 Cardamom,1 lb Lamb,1 tsp Red Chilli powder,1 tbsp Biryani masala

name: Matar Paneer
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds and let them splutter.,2. Add chopped onions and saut√© until golden brown.,3. Add ginger and green chilli, saut√© for a minute.,4. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften.,5. Stir in peas, salt, and garam masala.,6. Cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally.,7. Garnish with chopped coriander leaves before serving.
ingredients: 1 tbls Sunflower Oil,225g Paneer,2 Ginger,1 tsp Cumin,1 tsp Turmeric,1 tsp Coriander,1 Green Chilli,4 large Tomato,150g Peas,1 tsp Garam Masala,Small bunch Coriander,to serve Naan Bread

name: Nutty Chicken Curry
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add chopped onions and saut√© until golden brown.,2. Add minced garlic and ginger, and saut√© for a minute.,3. Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.,4. Stir in peanut butter and chicken stock, and simmer until chicken is cooked through.,5. Add yogurt and mix well before serving.
ingredients: 1 large Red Chilli,0.5 Ginger,1 large Garlic,Bunch Coriander,1 tbsp Sunflower Oil,4 Chicken Breasts,5 tblsp Peanut Butter,150ml Chicken Stock,200g Greek Yogurt

name: Butter Chicken
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, and spices for 2 hours,2. Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked,3. Heat butter in a pan, add ginger-garlic paste,4. Add tomato puree and cook for 10 minutes,5. Add cream, garam masala, and kasuri methi,6. Add the cooked chicken,7. Simmer for 10 minutes,8. Garnish with cilantro and serve with naan
ingredients: 500g Chicken,1 cup Yogurt,1 tbsp Lemon juice,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,2 tbsp Butter,1 cup Tomato puree,1/2 cup Cream,1 tsp Garam masala,1 tsp Kasuri methi,Fresh cilantro

name: Palak Paneer
instructions: 1. Blanch spinach leaves in boiling water,2. Make a puree of the blanched spinach,3. Cut paneer into cubes and lightly fry,4. Heat oil, add cumin seeds and bay leaf,5. Add ginger-garlic paste and green chilies,6. Add tomatoes and cook until soft,7. Add spinach puree and spices,8. Add fried paneer and simmer,9. Finish with cream and garam masala
ingredients: 500g Fresh spinach,250g Paneer,2 Tomatoes,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,2 Green chilies,1 tsp Cumin seeds,1 Bay leaf,1 tsp Garam masala,2 tbsp Cream,3 tbsp Oil

name: Chole Bhature
instructions: For Chole:,1. Soak chickpeas overnight and pressure cook,2. Heat oil, add cumin seeds and bay leaves,3. Add ginger-garlic paste and onions,4. Add tomatoes and spices,5. Add cooked chickpeas and simmer,For Bhature:,1. Make dough with flour, yogurt, and baking powder,2. Rest for 2 hours,3. Roll into circles and deep fry until puffed
ingredients: 2 cups Chickpeas,2 cups All-purpose flour,1/2 cup Yogurt,1 tsp Baking powder,2 Onions,3 Tomatoes,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,2 tsp Chole masala,Oil for frying

name: Tandoori Chicken
instructions: 1. Make cuts in chicken pieces,2. Marinate with lemon juice and salt for 30 minutes,3. Mix yogurt with all spices and red food color,4. Marinate chicken with this mixture for 4-6 hours,5. Preheat oven to 200¬∞C,6. Cook chicken for 45 minutes, turning once,7. Baste with oil occasionally,8. Serve hot with mint chutney
ingredients: 1 kg Chicken,1 cup Yogurt,2 tbsp Lemon juice,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,2 tsp Red chili powder,1 tsp Garam masala,1 tsp Cumin powder,1 tsp Coriander powder,Red food color,2 tbsp Oil

name: Masala Dosa
instructions: For Dosa Batter:,1. Soak rice and urad dal separately for 6 hours,2. Grind separately to smooth pastes,3. Mix and ferment overnight,For Potato Filling:,1. Boil and mash potatoes,2. Temper with mustard seeds, curry leaves,3. Add onions, green chilies, and turmeric,To Make Dosa:,1. Spread batter on hot griddle,2. Add filling and fold,3. Serve with chutney and sambar
ingredients: 3 cups Rice,1 cup Urad dal,4 large Potatoes,2 Onions,1 tsp Mustard seeds,10 Curry leaves,2 Green chilies,1/2 tsp Turmeric,Oil for cooking

name: Aloo Gobi
instructions: 1. Cut potatoes and cauliflower into medium pieces,2. Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds,3. Add ginger and green chilies,4. Add potatoes and cook for 5 minutes,5. Add cauliflower and all spices,6. Cover and cook on low heat for 15 minutes,7. Stir occasionally to prevent sticking,8. Garnish with cilantro
ingredients: 3 medium Potatoes,1 medium Cauliflower,1 tsp Cumin seeds,1 inch Ginger,2 Green chilies,1 tsp Turmeric,1 tsp Coriander powder,1/2 tsp Red chili powder,3 tbsp Oil,Fresh cilantro

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours,2. Grill chicken until cooked through,3. Heat oil in a pan, add onions,4. Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes,5. Add cream and tomato puree,6. Add grilled chicken and simmer,7. Season with garam masala,8. Garnish with cilantro
ingredients: 500g Chicken cubes,1 cup Yogurt,2 Onions,3 Tomatoes,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,1/2 cup Cream,1/2 cup Tomato puree,2 tsp Garam masala,1 tsp Red chili powder,Fresh cilantro

name: Samosa
instructions: For Filling:,1. Boil and mash potatoes,2. Heat oil, add cumin seeds,3. Add green peas and spices,4. Mix with mashed potatoes,For Wrapper:,1. Make dough with flour, oil, and water,2. Roll into circles and cut in half,3. Form cones and fill with potato mixture,4. Seal edges with water,5. Deep fry until golden brown
ingredients: 2 cups All-purpose flour,4 Potatoes,1 cup Green peas,1 tsp Cumin seeds,1 tsp Garam masala,1 tsp Coriander powder,2 Green chilies,1 inch Ginger,Oil for frying

name: Fish Curry
instructions: 1. Clean and cut fish into pieces,2. Marinate with turmeric and salt,3. Heat oil and lightly fry fish pieces,4. In the same oil, add mustard seeds,5. Add onions, ginger-garlic paste,6. Add tomatoes and coconut milk,7. Add curry leaves and spices,8. Add fried fish and simmer,9. Cook until fish is tender
ingredients: 500g Fish fillets,1 cup Coconut milk,2 Onions,3 Tomatoes,1 tbsp Ginger-garlic paste,1 tsp Mustard seeds,10 Curry leaves,1 tsp Turmeric,2 tsp Coriander powder,1 tsp Red chili powder

name: Gulab Jamun
instructions: For Syrup:,1. Make sugar syrup with cardamom and rose water,For Jamuns:,1. Mix milk powder, flour, and baking soda,2. Add milk to form soft dough,3. Make small balls,4. Deep fry on low heat until golden,5. Soak in warm syrup for 2 hours,6. Serve warm or cold
ingredients: 1 cup Milk powder,1/4 cup All-purpose flour,1/4 tsp Baking soda,3-4 tbsp Milk,1.5 cups Sugar,1.5 cups Water,4-5 Cardamom pods,1 tsp Rose water,Oil for frying

name: Chicken Burger
instructions: For Chicken Patty:,1. Season ground chicken with salt, pepper, and garlic powder,2. Form into patties,3. Cook on grill or pan for 6-7 minutes each side,Assembly:,1. Toast burger buns,2. Spread mayo on bottom bun,3. Add lettuce, tomato, and onion,4. Place chicken patty,5. Add cheese if desired,6. Top with pickles and top bun
ingredients: 500g Ground chicken,4 Burger buns,4 Cheese slices,2 Tomatoes,1 Onion,Lettuce leaves,Pickles,Mayonnaise,Salt and pepper

name: Margherita Pizza
instructions: For Dough:,1. Mix flour, yeast, salt, and water,2. Knead until smooth and elastic,3. Rise for 1 hour,Assembly:,1. Roll out dough,2. Spread tomato sauce,3. Add mozzarella cheese,4. Add fresh basil leaves,5. Drizzle with olive oil,6. Bake at 220¬∞C for 12-15 minutes
ingredients: 2 cups Pizza flour,1 tsp Active yeast,1 cup Tomato sauce,200g Fresh mozzarella,Fresh basil leaves,3 tbsp Olive oil,1 tsp Salt,3/4 cup Warm water

name: Fish and Chips
instructions: For Chips:,1. Cut potatoes into thick strips,2. Double fry - once at 140¬∞C, then at 180¬∞C,For Fish:,1. Make batter with flour, beer, and seasoning,2. Coat fish fillets in batter,3. Deep fry until golden and crispy,4. Serve with chips, mushy peas, and tartar sauce
ingredients: 4 Fish fillets (cod or haddock),4 large Potatoes,1 cup Plain flour,1 cup Beer,1 tsp Baking powder,Salt and pepper,Oil for frying,Tartar sauce,Mushy peas

name: Pad Thai
instructions: 1. Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft,2. Heat oil in a wok,3. Add garlic and shrimp,4. Push to one side, scramble eggs,5. Add drained noodles,6. Add fish sauce, tamarind, and palm sugar,7. Add bean sprouts and chives,8. Garnish with peanuts and lime
ingredients: 200g Rice noodles,200g Shrimp,2 Eggs,2 cloves Garlic,2 tbsp Fish sauce,2 tbsp Tamarind paste,2 tbsp Palm sugar,1 cup Bean sprouts,2 Green onions,1/4 cup Peanuts,Lime wedges

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: For Dressing:,1. Mix anchovy paste, garlic, lemon juice,2. Add egg yolk and whisk,3. Slowly add olive oil while whisking,4. Add parmesan cheese,Assembly:,1. Tear romaine lettuce into pieces,2. Toss with dressing,3. Add croutons and more parmesan,4. Serve immediately
ingredients: 2 heads Romaine lettuce,1/2 cup Parmesan cheese,1 cup Croutons,2 cloves Garlic,2 Anchovy fillets,1 Egg yolk,1/4 cup Lemon juice,1/2 cup Olive oil,Black pepper

name: Sushi Rolls
instructions: For Sushi Rice:,1. Cook sushi rice with rice vinegar and sugar,2. Cool to room temperature,Assembly:,1. Place nori on bamboo mat,2. Spread rice evenly,3. Add cucumber, avocado, and fish,4. Roll tightly using the mat,5. Cut into pieces with sharp knife,6. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi
ingredients: 2 cups Sushi rice,4 Nori sheets,200g Fresh fish (salmon/tuna),1 Cucumber,1 Avocado,3 tbsp Rice vinegar,1 tbsp Sugar,Soy sauce,Wasabi,Pickled ginger

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: 1. Season ground beef with cumin, chili powder, and paprika,2. Cook beef in a pan until browned,3. Warm tortillas in a dry pan,4. Fill tortillas with beef,5. Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese,6. Add sour cream and salsa,7. Serve with lime wedges
ingredients: 500g Ground beef,8 Corn tortillas,1 cup Shredded cheese,2 Tomatoes,1 head Lettuce,1 Onion,Sour cream,Salsa,Lime wedges,Mexican spices

name: Greek Salad
instructions: 1. Cut tomatoes, cucumbers, and red onion,2. Add olives and feta cheese,3. Make dressing with olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano,4. Toss everything together,5. Season with salt and pepper,6. Let marinate for 15 minutes before serving
ingredients: 4 Tomatoes,2 Cucumbers,1 Red onion,200g Feta cheese,1 cup Kalamata olives,1/4 cup Olive oil,2 tbsp Lemon juice,1 tsp Dried oregano,Salt and pepper

name: French Onion Soup
instructions: 1. Slice onions thinly,2. Cook onions slowly in butter until caramelized (45 mins),3. Add wine and cook until reduced,4. Add beef stock and thyme,5. Simmer for 30 minutes,6. Ladle into bowls,7. Top with bread and gruyere cheese,8. Broil until cheese is bubbly
ingredients: 6 large Onions,4 tbsp Butter,1/2 cup Dry white wine,6 cups Beef stock,1 tsp Fresh thyme,6 slices French bread,1.5 cups Gruyere cheese,Salt and pepper

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: 1. Cream butter and sugars together,2. Beat in eggs and vanilla,3. Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt,4. Fold in chocolate chips,5. Drop spoonfuls on baking sheet,6. Bake at 180¬∞C for 10-12 minutes,7. Cool on wire rack
ingredients: 2 1/4 cups All-purpose flour,1 cup Butter,3/4 cup Brown sugar,3/4 cup White sugar,2 Eggs,2 tsp Vanilla extract,1 tsp Baking soda,1 tsp Salt,2 cups Chocolate chips
